objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Action/Adventure themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Action/Adventure narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Action/Adventure lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a high-stakes action sequence involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to education and learning in a action context
Students engage in action themed role-play about education and learning using slang register
Students create original action themed content about education and learning in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Action/Adventure scenario?
What chase or pursuit might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Action/Adventure story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Action/Adventure perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this action scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Action/Adventure situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using slang register in action context
Character B: Responding in slang register within action theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Action/Adventure theme: High energy, excitement, physical challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Action/Adventure themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
